Authors: Utama D.N., Noveta B.K., Warman G.P., Setyono J.C., Wikamulia N., Tatulus R.L.
Title: A simple novel mechanism for company resilience measurement based on life-resilience behavior of chameleons (LRebeaCh)
Source title: Proceedings of 2019 International Conference on Information and Communication Technology and Systems, ICTS 2019
Affiliations: Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Utama, D.N., Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Noveta, B.K., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Warman, G.P., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Setyono, J.C., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wikamulia, N., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Tatulus, R.L., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This paper portrays a novel mechanism for measuring the resilience issue. The proposed mechanism is motivated by natural-phenomenon of real chameleons in protecting and safeguarding their life from predators or extreme temperature. The chameleons' natural-capability for defending their life is scientifically adopted as a standard for thing (e.g. company) to preserve its business running good. Thru five simple stages (i.e. preliminary analysis, literature review, data/information analysis, measurement model construction, and measurement test), the study was conducted. In final part, the offered mechanism was realized in measuring the resilience potency of two companies (dummy companies) by comparing their resilience value with resilience base-line (standard). © 2019 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Chameleon; Extreme temperatures; Literature reviews; Measurement model; Measurement-based; Natural phenomena; Preliminary analysis; Resilience; Data communication systems
